Dow Jones Reprints at 1-800-843-0008 or visit www.djreprints.com. http://online.wsj.com/articles/how-coach-k-motivates-usa-basketball-1410474885 By Don Yaeger Updated September 12, 2014 How do you get some of the world's wealthiest athletes to perform—in peak form—during their summer vacation? This is USA Basketball's eternal quandary. It is a challenge that only got tougher last month, when Paul George gruesomely broke his right leg during a Team USA scrimmage.
